DCC-QOL.FriendlyFireFail: Attack may strike your ally; make a second attack roll against their AC.

DCC-QOL.SettingTakeDamageManualHint: Display a reminder message to manually subtract damage when DamageAutoApply not enabled.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateDeedDieRollHint: Automate Deed Die Roll for warrior/dwarf attacks. (Set 'Attack Bonus Mode' to 'Manual Roll' in sheet config.)
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateFriendlyFireHint: When firing into melee and missile attack misses, request an additional d100 roll .
DCC-QOL.SettingFiringIntoMeleePenalty: Automate penalty when firing into melee
DCC-QOL.SettingFiringIntoMeleePenaltyHin: When firing a missile attack into melee, apply a -1 penalty to the attack roll.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateMonsterCritLuck: Automate PC's Luck modifier against monster's critical hit.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateMonsterCritLuckHi: PC's Luck modifier always alters a monster's critical hit.

DCC-QOL.SettingDisplayHitMissHint: Display hit/miss and target on attack chat card.
DCC-QOL.SettingLogHint: Log information written into GM's console.log only.
DCC-QOL.SettingWeaponRangeCheckHint: Checks max range for melee and ranged attacks, and applies distance-based to-hit penalties for ranged weapons.
DCC-QOL.socketlibWarning: Module DCC-QOL requires the 'socketlib' module. Please install and activate it.
DCC-QOL.TakeDamageManual: Note: You must manually apply the damage to the target.

DCC-QOL.libwrapperWarning: Module DCC-QOL requires the 'libWrapper' module. Please install and activate it.
DCC-QOL.WeaponMeleeWarn: Range Check: Melee target is {distance}{units} away, which is beyond normal reach.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangedWarn: Target appears to be too far ({distance} {units}) for a {weapon} (maximum {range} {units}.)
DCC-QOL.WeaponWarningNonBackstabBonus: This weapon does not give you a backstab bonus.
DCC-QOL.SettingAutomateLuckyWeaponModifi: If 'Automate Lucky Weapon' is enabled in DCC system settings, specify the modifier to be used:
NONE: No automation for lucky weapon modifier (ignore the DCC setting)
STANDARD: Apply attacker's current luck modifier (rules as written)
PLUS ONE: Always add +1, regardless of attacker's luck score
POSITIVE: Only apply attacker's luck mod if it's > 0 (no negative luck)
DCC-QOL.AutomateLuckyWeaponsNotEnabledWa: Note that 'Automate Lucky Weapon' is not currently enabled in DCC system settings, so no Lucky Weapon modifier will be applied.
DCC-QOL.SettingUseQoLAttackCardHint: If enabled, attack rolls made through the character sheet will use an enhanced Quality of Life chat card, offering more information and quick action buttons. If disabled, the standard DCC system chat card will be used.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangeNoAttackerTokenWarn: Range Check: No controlled token found for attacker. Cannot perform range check.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangeNoTargetWarn: Range Check: No target selected. Cannot perform range check.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangeMultipleTargetsWarn: Range Check: Multiple targets selected. Using '{targetName}' for range check.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangedWarnTooFar: Range Check: Target at {distance}{units} is beyond weapon's maximum range of {maxRange}{units}.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangedWarnLong: Range Check: Target at {distance}{units} is at Long Range ({mediumRange}-{longRange}{units}). Action die stepped down by 1.
DCC-QOL.WeaponRangedWarnMedium: Range Check: Target at {distance}{units} is at Medium Range ({shortRange}-{mediumRange}{units}). -2 to attack roll.
DCC-QOL.DialogMeleeOutOfRangeContent: Your target is {distance}{units} away, which is beyond melee range.

DCC-QOL.DialogRangedLongRangeContent: Your target is {distance}{units} away, but your {weaponName}'s range is {shortRange}/{mediumRange}/{longRange}{units}, incurring a -1d to-hit penalty.
DCC-QOL.DialogRangedOutOfRangeContent: Your target is {distance}{units} away, but your {weaponName}'s maximum range is {maxRange}{units}.
